pullRequest.title: [BEAM-9364] Refactor KafkaIO to use DeserializerProviders
pullRequest.bodyText:
This builds on your previous PR with some API improvements. Since this adjusts the public API that will be out as part of 2.20.0 is probably better if we include it as part of 2.20.0 too.
R: @aromanenko-dev

nodes.bodyText: Why do we need to set key deserializer explicitly here if it will be overridden later?

I'd suggest to extract these two string arguments into dedicated Confluent Schema Registry input arguments object to avoid potential collisions with other withKeyDeserializer(String, String) methods that can be added in the future. Also, it can be extended (if needed) and it will make clear that this is used only for CSR's schema.
